definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the effect of butyl rubber stopper on the stability of procaine hydrochloride injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究丁基橡胶塞对普鲁卡因注射液稳定性的影响。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the pharmacological effect of procainamide on transmural ventricular repolarization.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究普鲁卡因胺对心室跨壁复极时间的影响。

sentences.english: That's the effect of the procaine, and it'll soon be over.
sentences.chinese: 是因为注射了普鲁卡因的关系，很快就会恢复。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the effects and side effect of procaine in treating obvious hemoptysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结应用普鲁卡因治疗大咯血的疗效和不良反应。

sentences.english: The goal summarizes Procaine's clinical practice, the instruction clinical medication.
sentences.chinese: 目的综述普鲁卡因的临床应用，指导临床用药。

sentences.english: Have you ever had an injection of procaine before?
sentences.chinese: 你以前打过普鲁卡因吗？

definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
